info.title: Azure Database Migration Service Resource Provider

filename.description: Specifies the MySQL binlog file name

position.description: Specifies the position in the binlog file

name.description: Specifies the MySQL binlog file name

position.description: Specifies the position in the binlog file

fileSeqNum.description: Specifies the the sequential number of the binlog fie, extracted from the file name

migrateAllViews.description: If true, all view definitions will be migrated in the selected databases

migrateAllTriggers.description: If true, all trigger definitions will be migrated in the selected databases

migrateAllEvents.description: If true, all event definitions will be migrated in the selected databases

migrateAllRoutines.description: If true, all routine definitions will be migrated in the selected databases

migrateAllTablesSchema.description: If true, all table's schemas will be migrated in the selected databases

migrateUserSystemTables.description: If true, all users/grants will be migrated
